title: Any person who owns a dwelling unit on ownership basis in Municipal Corporation areas shall not be held eligible under the scheme
clause_text: Any person who owns a dwelling unit on ownership basis in Municipal Corporation areas shall not be held eligible under the scheme. Any person, who can be held eligible under more than one SRS, shall be held eligible in only one scheme.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
